description: Enhanced Skyhook monitoring dashboard with comprehensive metrics visualization

targets.expr: (sum(skyhook_status{status="waiting"} == 1) or vector(0)) + (sum(skyhook_status{status="paused"} == 1) or vector(0)) + (sum(skyhook_status{status="disabled"} == 1) or vector(0)) + (sum(skyhook_status{status="unknown"} == 1) or vector(0))

(skyhook_status{status="erroring"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="blocked"} == 1) or  
(skyhook_status{status="paused"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="disabled"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="in_progress"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="waiting"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="complete"} == 1)

(skyhook_status{status="erroring"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="blocked"} == 1) or  
(skyhook_status{status="paused"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="disabled"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="in_progress"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="waiting"} == 1) or
(skyhook_status{status="complete"} == 1)

sum(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="waiting"} or vector(0)) + 
sum(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="paused"} or vector(0)) + 
sum(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="disabled"} or vector(0)) + 
sum(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="unknown"} or vector(0))

(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="erroring"} > 0) or
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="blocked"} > 0) or  
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="paused"} > 0) or
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="disabled"} > 0) or
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="in_progress"} > 0) or
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="waiting"} > 0) or
(skyhook_node_status_count{skyhook_name=~"$skyhook", status="complete"} > 0)

title: Skyhook Dashboard
